# tessell_vpc_peering (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cloud_type` (String) Tessell supported cloud types
- `name` (String) Tessell VPC Peering Name
- `region` (String) Region of the Tessell VPC
- `subscription_name` (String) Name of the subscription
- `vpc_name` (String) Name of the source VPC to peer

### Read-Only

- `aws_client_info` (List of Object) AWS VPC Peering Client Info for Service Consumer (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--aws_client_info))
- `azure_client_info` (List of Object) Azure VPC Peering Client Info (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--azure_client_info))
- `cloud_id` (String) CloudId of Peering Connection
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `metadata` (List of Object) Metadata about Vpc Peering (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `status` (String) Tessell VPC Peering Status
